item.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.7°C

item.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
item.description: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 20 April 2013

item.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
